price: 7 Celui qui a créé toute chose à la perfection et qui a créé le premier homme à partir d’argile,
arabic: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَحۡسَنَ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقَهُۥۖ وَبَدَأَ خَلۡقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنِ مِن طِينٖ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: alladhī aḥsana kulla shayin khalaqahu wabada-a khalqa al-insāni min ṭīnin
